system.description:
When a charge is expended, this item causes all enemies within 60 feet (including those who are hidden or invisible) to emit a glowing light, as if they were aflame.

This wand is crafted from dark, smooth wood, featuring a slightly twisted design. At the tip, a striking gem shaped like an eyeball glows with a fiery red hue, while faint, glowing runes spiral along its length.
system.unidentifiedDesc: This wand is crafted from dark, smooth wood, featuring a slightly twisted design. At the tip, a striking gem shaped like an eyeball glows with a fiery red hue, while faint, glowing runes spiral along its length.
